about_the_game:
.

Spawning as a lonely abandoned spider egg you need to build your web across the universe and start your home. Watch out though, your neighbors are just as territorial so you'll need to use the time you have to fight back.

Webcraft's core mechanic is similar to the arcade claw machine game where you have to aim, shoot and hope you successfully grab what you're after. Use your rewards to craft items, build your base and grow a farm to survive.

Features:


  • Use your claw machine skills to catch flying resources and keep an eye out for rare resources.
  • Build a farm to feed yourself and maybe even make money by trading your harvest.
  • Craft turrets, factories and other buildings to strengthen your base's output and defense.
  • Explore the solar system and attack local wildlife to steal their treasure.

.

Big thanks to all the support from everyone for getting the game this far!

name: WebCraft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Webcraft is a claw machine mixed with open world crafting game in space. Catch resources floating by, craft and expand your base from a single square!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
